00032 static void noprior_prob(std::vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator bcn_iter,
00033                  const double mu, const double S);
00034 
00035 static void noprior_prob_normal(vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator bcn_iter,
00036                 const pair<double,double> mu, const pair<double,double> var,
00037                 const double bias);

00040         std::vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator bcn, double prior_prob);

00042 typedef std::vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator BCN_iter;

00044 
00045 void binary_segmenter(std::vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator bcn_start,
00046                 std::vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator bcn_end,
00047                 std::vector<BinaryCNodeParam> bcn_params,
00048                 int level)
00049         {
00050         if (bcn_params.empty()) {
00051                 for (BCN_iter Bit = bcn_start; Bit != bcn_end; Bit++) {
00052                         Bit->prob = 1.0;
00053                         Bit->level = level;
00054                         }
00055                 return;
00056                 }
00057 
00058         double mu = bcn_params[0].mu;
00059         double S = bcn_params[0].S;
00060         double tprob = bcn_params[0].tprob;
00061 
00062         for (BCN_iter Bit = bcn_start; Bit != bcn_end; Bit++) {
00063                 noprior_prob(Bit,mu,S);
00064                 }
00065 
00066         bcn_start->path_back = std::make_pair(0,1);
00067 
00068         for (BCN_iter Bit = bcn_start+1; Bit != bcn_end; Bit++) {
00069                 carry_forward(Bit-1,Bit,tprob);
00070                 }
00071 
00072         std::deque<int> binary_path;
00073 
00074         BCN_iter iter = bcn_end - 1;
00075         int back_to = iter->prob > 0.5 ? 0 : 1;
00076 
00077         binary_path.push_front(back_to);
00078 
00079          while (iter != bcn_start) {
00080                 if (!back_to) back_to = iter->path_back.first;
00081                 else back_to = iter->path_back.second;
00082                 binary_path.push_front(back_to);
00083                 iter--;
00084                 }
00085 
00086 
00087         iter = bcn_start;
00088         int idx = 0;
00089 
00090         while (iter != bcn_end) {
00091                 if (!binary_path[idx]) {
00092                         iter->level = level;
00093                         idx++;
00094                         iter++;
00095                         continue;
00096                         }
00097 
00098                 BCN_iter seg_start = iter;
00099 
00100                 while (iter != bcn_end) {
00101                         if (!binary_path[idx]) break;
00102                         idx++;
00103                         iter++;
00104                         }
00105 
00106                 BCN_iter seg_end = iter;
00107 
00108                 std::vector<BinaryCNodeParam> bcn_params_short;
00109                 bcn_params_short.assign(bcn_params.begin()+1,bcn_params.end());
00110 
00111                 binary_segmenter(seg_start,seg_end,bcn_params_short,level+1);
00112                 }
00113         }
00114

00117 void binary_segmenter_normal(BCN_iter bcn_start, BCN_iter bcn_end,
00118                 std::vector<BinaryCNodeParamNormal> bcn_params,
00119                 int level)
00120         {
00121         if (bcn_params.empty()) {
00122                 for (BCN_iter Bit = bcn_start; Bit != bcn_end; Bit++) {
00123                         Bit->prob = 1.0;
00124                         Bit->level = level;
00125                         }
00126                 return;
00127                 }
00128 
00129         pair<double,double> mu = bcn_params[0].mu;
00130         pair<double,double> var = bcn_params[0].var;
00131         double tprob = bcn_params[0].tprob;
00132         double bias = bcn_params[0].bias;
00133 
00134         for (BCN_iter Bit = bcn_start; Bit != bcn_end; Bit++) {
00135                 noprior_prob_normal(Bit,mu,var,bias);
00136                 }
00137 
00138 
00139         bcn_start->path_back = std::make_pair(0,1);
00140 
00141         for (BCN_iter Bit = bcn_start+1; Bit != bcn_end; Bit++) {
00142                 carry_forward(Bit-1,Bit,tprob);
00143                 }
00144 
00145         std::deque<int> binary_path;
00146 
00147         BCN_iter iter = bcn_end - 1;
00148         int back_to = iter->prob > 0.5 ? 0 : 1;
00149 
00150         binary_path.push_front(back_to);
00151 
00152          while (iter != bcn_start) {
00153                 if (!back_to) back_to = iter->path_back.first;
00154                 else back_to = iter->path_back.second;
00155                 binary_path.push_front(back_to);
00156                 iter--;
00157                 }
00158 
00159 
00160         iter = bcn_start;
00161         int idx = 0;
00162 
00163         while (iter != bcn_end) {
00164                 if (!binary_path[idx]) {
00165                         iter->level = level;
00166                         idx++;
00167                         iter++;
00168                         continue;
00169                         }
00170 
00171                 BCN_iter seg_start = iter;
00172 
00173                 while (iter != bcn_end) {
00174                         if (!binary_path[idx]) break;
00175                         idx++;
00176                         iter++;
00177                         }
00178 
00179                 BCN_iter seg_end = iter;
00180 
00181                 std::vector<BinaryCNodeParamNormal> bcn_params_short;
00182                 bcn_params_short.assign(bcn_params.begin()+1,bcn_params.end());
00183 
00184                 binary_segmenter_normal(seg_start,seg_end,bcn_params_short,level+1);
00185                 }
00186         }

00192 
00193 void noprior_prob(std::vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator bcn_iter,
00194                  const double mu, const double S)
00195         {
00196         double x = (bcn_iter->value - mu)/S;
00197         bcn_iter->prob = 1.0 - 1.0/(1.0 + exp(-x));
00198         }
00199 
00200 
00201 void noprior_prob_normal(std::vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator bcn_iter,
00202                 const pair<double,double> mu, const pair<double,double> var,
00203                 const double bias)
00204         {
00205         double x = (bcn_iter->value - mu.first);
00206         double p1 = bias*exp(-0.5*(x*x)/var.first)/sqrt(var.first);
00207 
00208         x = (bcn_iter->value - mu.second);
00209         double p2 = exp(-0.5*(x*x)/var.second)/sqrt(var.second);
00210 
00211         bcn_iter->prob = p1/(p1 + p2);
00212         }
00213 
00214 
00215 void carry_forward(std::vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator bcn_prev,
00216         std::vector<BinaryCNode>::iterator bcn, double prior_prob)
00217         {
00218         double prev_prob = bcn_prev->prob;
00219 
00220         double p0 = bcn->prob;
00221         p0 *= prev_prob*prior_prob +  (1.0 - prev_prob)*(1.0 - prior_prob);
00222 
00223         double p1 = 1.0 - bcn->prob;
00224         p1 *= prev_prob*(1.0 - prior_prob) + (1.0 - prev_prob)*prior_prob;
00225 
00226         bcn->prob = p0/(p0 + p1);
00227 
00228         bcn->path_back = std::make_pair(0,0);
00229 
00230         if (prev_prob*prior_prob < (1.0 - prev_prob)*(1.0 - prior_prob)) {
00231                 bcn->path_back.first = 1;
00232                 }
00233 
00234         if (prev_prob*(1.0 - prior_prob) < (1.0 - prev_prob)*prior_prob) {
00235                 bcn->path_back.second = 1;
00236                 }
00237         }

00239 
00240 std::vector<BinaryCNodeParam> make_bcn_params(std::valarray<double> mu,
00241         double prob0, double tprob)
00242     {
00243     std::vector<BinaryCNodeParam> bcn_params;
00244 
00245     for (int i=1; i<mu.size(); i++) {
00246         double m1 = exp(mu[i-1]);
00247         double m2 = exp(mu[i]);
00248         double m = log(0.5) + log(m1 + m2);
00249         double d = m - mu[i-1];
00250         double S = d/log(prob0/(1.0 - prob0));
00251         bcn_params.push_back(BinaryCNodeParam(m,S,tprob));
00252 
00253                 printf("-- make_bcn_params m,S,tprob = %f,%f,%f\n", m,S,tprob);
00254         }
00255     return bcn_params;
00256         }
00257

00259 
00260 vector<BinaryCNodeParamNormal> make_bcn_params_normal( valarray<double> mu,
00261                 valarray<double> var, valarray<double> tprob, valarray<double> bias)
00262     {
00263     vector<BinaryCNodeParamNormal> bcn_params;
00264 
00265         for (int i=1; i<mu.size(); i++) {
00266                 std::pair<double,double>mu1 =
00267                         std::make_pair<double,double>(mu[i-1],mu[i]);
00268                 std::pair<double,double>var1 =
00269                         std::make_pair<double,double>(var[i-1],var[i]);
00270 
00271                 bcn_params.push_back(BinaryCNodeParamNormal(mu1,var1,
00272                         tprob[i-1],bias[i-1]));
00273 
00274                 }
00275     return bcn_params;
00276         }
